manifest.name: @ Symbol Linking
manifest.description: Adds ability to link with @ (the At Symbol) in Obsidian. Can limit @ linking to specific folders e.g. People/
manifest.author: Evan Bonsignori

data.manifestValue: Adds ability to link with @ (the At Symbol) in Obsidian. Can limit @ linking to specific folders e.g. People/
data.communityListValue: Link with @ (the at symbol). Can scope @ linking to a specific directory e.g. Contacts/
